messages.subject: Founding Fathers
messages.msgSnippet: Speaking of the Founding Fathers, all those lists that are currently wandering the net and whether those quotes were truely taken out of context or intent, the
messages.messageBody:
Speaking of the Founding Fathers, all those lists that are currently
wandering the net and whether those quotes were truely taken out of context
or intent, the History Channel is doing a week long special on the Founding
Fathers. Supposedly it is not all whitewashed and spiffed up to please
everyone's pc fallacies.

It starts Monday night at 9 p.m. Pacific and 8 p.m. Central. Don't know
when it will show in other time zones.

Lynda
If Ignorance Is Bliss Why Aren't More People Happy?
